meanings.sent1: The two countries are coannexing their territories to create a larger nation.
meanings.sent2: The city council is coannexing the neighboring town to expand its borders.
meanings.sent3: The idea of coannexing all the pizza toppings onto one slice sounded messy but delicious.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for gardening and painting coannexed beautifully in her colorful backyard mural.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle pieces coannexed perfectly, completing the picture with a satisfying click.

meanings.definition: The act of joining or uniting together
meanings.sent1: The coannexing of the two rivers formed a powerful waterway for transportation.
meanings.sent2: The coannexing of different departments improved communication within the company.
meanings.sent3: The coannexing of the mismatched socks in the laundry basket was a never-ending mystery.
meanings.sent4: The coannexing of flavors in the new recipe created a unique and delicious dish.
meanings.sent5: The coannexing of voices in the choir produced a harmonious and beautiful sound.
